au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: THERMAL_L1=L2=6m_central_apx10
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(5200,0) # Drive guide to g6 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g6) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.9213) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.3946)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(32.0, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(32.0, 0) driveBsz(260.0)
